raw_body: COORAY – DR. NILANTHI – Dearly beloved wife of Frank Cooray (Retired St. Sebastians College,​ Moratuwa),​ loving mother of Yashani & Aruni (HSBC HonKong),​ mother-in-law of Indika (Union Bank,​ Col-3) & Clive (HSBC HongKong),​ loving grandmother of Yashane,​ Rashael,​ Aaron & Yeneli,​ loving daughter of late Raymond and Audrey,​ sister of Siromi and Prof. Harindra Fernando (USA),​ sister-in-law of late Linton and Ravini. Funeral will take place on Saturday, 19th Aug. 2023 at St. Joseph’s Church,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa at 4.30 p.m. Cortege leaves residence ‘Mount Carmel’,​ No. 116/​7,​ Idama,​ Moratuwa.052157
